aboutTitle: Hi, I'm Myke, I'm looking for my first job as a Front End
aboutParagraph1: I am a Front-End developer, which I am currently studying the back-end, I have a great passion for programming and technology in general, I love creating things, being able to develop applications in the Front-End brings me a lot of satisfaction, I really want to advance my progress as a developer and I want to be able to participate in the trajectory of a company and grow with this experience.
aboutParagraph2: In my spare time, I always love to know about astronomy topics, I support technologies that impact the environment in a less aggressive way and I enjoy playing video games.
